Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-NonRigidContainerEntityType

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode where concept is-a _NonRigidContainerEntityType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _NonRigidContainerEntityTypeNonRigidContainerEntityTypeA container having dimensions that adjust somewhat based on the amount and shape of the material placed within it.

name: NonRigidContainerEntityType
title: NonRigidContainerEntityType
description: A container having dimensions that adjust somewhat based on the amount and shape of the material placed within it.
